column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Boss L. - Thank you for your great review. We appreciate your taking the time to provide us invaluable feedback
column2: and we're proud to call you one of our "JINYA Regulars." We understand one of our ongoing shortcomings is slow service
column3: but please know numerous factors outside of our control can cause delays. For example
column4: just recently our point-of-sale terminals were not sending tickets to the kitchen properly
column5: which threw a huge monkey wrench into our gears. But we always appreciate when our guests are understanding
column6: as I do hope you notice that our front of house is never lollygagging when there's a line up front and ramen to be served.
